messages.msg: Welcome to U-report! Please type A for ENGLISH; B for PIDGIN; C for HAUSA; D for Yoruba and E for Igbo
a
Please reply with Ur NAME or NICKNAME,for example "Tolu" or "Tom" or "Ahmed".  If U want to remain anonymous use any letters or numbers ALL MESSAGES ARE FREE !
Jim
Ok, I have your NAME as "Jim". If this is not right, reply with "undo", otherwise reply with what YEAR were you born.
UNDO
Sorry I got that wrong. Ok, please reply with just your name. For example: "Thomas"
Jimmy
Ok, I have your NAME as "Jimmy". If this is not right, reply with "undo", otherwise reply with what YEAR were you born.
I was born in 1981
Great, we are looking forward to hearing from our youth. Youth are our future. What GENDER are you? Reply with M for Male or F for Female.
m
Excellent, we need leaders like U on U-report. What STATE are U living in currently?
Xen
Sorry, we don't recognize that state, please respond with the Nigerian state you currently live in.
Lagos
From which LGA will you be reporting from?
Xen!
Sorry, we don't recognize that LGA, please respond with the LGA in Lagos you currently live in.
Oyo
Welldon you are almost fully registered. What WARD are U living in?
Ibadan
Thumbs up! You are almost there! What SETTLMENT are U currently living in. If you are not sure please reply with your Ward.
London
What is Ur OCCUPATION, choose one: a)Health b)Education c)Business d)Self Employed e)Student f)Uniformed Service g)Agriculture h)Social Worker i)Other j)Corpers
x
i didnt get that please choose one: a)Health b)Education c)Business d)Self Employed e)Student f)Uniformed Service g)Agriculture h)Social Worker i)Other j)Corpers
c
Congratulations,U will be able to share Ur views and get feedback. Please encourage your friends to sign up. Ur voice matters!! http://nigeria.ureport.in
